name: Care for A Memory
description:
Memories are fragile, and can often get lost when losing someone close to us. Can you help Mr Nishimura regain what he lost? 

Five items makes up a repressed memoir, that can be found in the memory room. Upon each entrance you are to find the 'key' item linked to this memory, but beware. Get too close to the wrong memory and you trigger his anxiety. 

Normal WASD controls to move. Use 'E' to pick objects up.- and just for fun, space bar to throw them. 

DEVLOG: 

I understand this game was very laggy and this was due to the large data all the reflections were taking. If I had more time, I would have  edited the LOD in script.
